content.query:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE name = 'vwClientes') 
	DROP VIEW [dbo].[vwClientes]
GO
CREATE VIEW [dbo].[vwClientes]
	AS SELECT 
	         ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Prop_1 ASC) AS Row#
			,Prop_1 as nome 
			,cast(Prop_0 as int) as codigo
			,[Prop_2] as telefone
			,[Prop_3] as email
			,[Prop_4] as dtNascimento
			,[Prop_5] as dtAneversario
			,[Prop_6] as dtIdade
			,[Prop_7] as sexo
			,[Prop_8] as origem
			,[Prop_9] as dtCadastro
			,[Prop_10] as unidade
		FROM [tbClientes]
		where ISNUMERIC(Prop_0) > 0
